arts.ttl: Chelsea remain in negotiations to sign Mathis Amougou from Saint-Étienne
arts.sum: According to Fabrizio Romano, Chelsea remain in negotiations to sign Mathis Amougou (19) from AS Saint-Étienne in the winter transfer window. The French midfielder is seen as a huge talent for…

arts.ttl: Official | Auxerre extending the contract of Donavan Léon
arts.sum: Donovan Léon’s (32) story at AJ Auxerre will continue for a couple more years. On Friday, the club extended his deal until 2027, with AJA being the only professional club…

AJ Auxerre and AS Saint-Étienne lock horns at the Stade Abbé Deschamps in what promises to be an interesting Ligue 1 clash. While Saint-Étienne have found their rhythm under new manager Eirik Hornelan...

arts.ttl: Auxerre predicted XI v Saint-Étienne: Gabriel Osho suspended, Kévin Danois out
arts.sum: Without a win in their last six matches, AJ Auxerre will be looking to get their season back on track when they host AS Saint-Étienne at the Stade de l’Abbé…

arts.ttl: Saint-Étienne predicted XI v Auxerre: Ben Old out, Ibrahim Sissoko suspended
arts.sum: AS Saint-Étienne must contend with a whole raft of absentees as they prepare to face AJ Auxerre at the Stade de l’Abbé Deschamps on Friday night. Ibrahim Sissoko remains suspended.…

arts.ttl: Chelsea ready to offer €15 million for Saint-Étienne’s Mathis Amougou
arts.sum: According to a report from RMC Sport and confirmed by Foot Mercato, Chelsea want to sign Mathis Amougou from AS Saint-Étienne. RMC Sport writes that the BlueCo who own Chelsea…
